docs.snippet: The Miami Heat opted to rest LeBron James and Chris Bosh, and the host Washington Wizards capitalized with a 114-93 victory Monday that clinched the No. 1 seed for the Indiana Pacers....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Miami Heat opted to rest LeBron James and Chris Bosh, and the host Washington Wizards capitalized with a 114-93 victory Monday that clinched the No. 1 seed for the Indiana Pacers.
docs.abstract: Washington Wizards beat Miami Heat, 114-93, after Heat opts to rest stars LeBron James and Chris Bosh, allowing Indiana Pacers to clinch top seed in NBA Eastern Conference; other basketball news noted.

headline.main: Heat Loss Gives Pacers No. 1 Seed
headline.print_headline: Heat Loss Gives Pacers No. 1 Seed

docs.snippet: If Carmelo Anthony’s success depends on whom he plays with, he could do worse than the Bulls’ Joakim Noah, a model leader and ideal teammate....
docs.lead_paragraph: If Carmelo Anthony’s success depends on whom he plays with, he could do worse than the Bulls’ Joakim Noah, a model leader and ideal teammate.
docs.abstract: Harvey Araton On Pro Basketball column notes that Chicago Bulls center Joakim Noah, widely regarded as a model leader, has been helping court New York Knicks star Carmelo Anthony, who is a potential free agent; argues that Noah could be an ideal teammate and role model for Anthony.

headline.main: The Bulls May Have a Role Model for Anthony
headline.print_headline: The Bulls May Have a Role Model for Anthony

docs.snippet: Louisville guard Shoni Schimmel was taken eighth over all by the Atlanta Dream on Monday night, making her the highest Native American drafted in the W.N.B.A....
docs.lead_paragraph: Louisville guard Shoni Schimmel was taken eighth over all by the Atlanta Dream on Monday night, making her the highest Native American drafted in the W.N.B.A.
docs.abstract: Louisville guard Shoni Schimmel is selected eighth overall by WNBA's Atlanta Dream, making her the highest drafted Native American in league's history; has attracted a devoted following through a combination of her flashy play and embrace of her heritage.

headline.main: Schimmel Brings Flair and Pride in Heritage to W.N.B.A.
headline.print_headline: Schimmel Brings Flair And Pride In Heritage

headline.main: Zander Hollander, Sports Trivia Shepherd, Dies at 91

docs.snippet: A look at the crucial relationship between sound, language and the development of literacy....
docs.lead_paragraph: A look at the crucial relationship between sound, language and the development of literacy.
docs.abstract: Lydia Denworth book I Can Hear You Whisper: An Intimate Journey Through the Science of Sound and Language details effect of deafness on development of her son Alex, in particular his language skills; explores relationship between brain, sound and language.

headline.main: A Son’s Deafness Prompts a Scientific Journey
headline.print_headline: A Son’s Deafness Prompts a Scientific Journey
